review: Dr Gaurav is an extremely thorough and patient doctor, who explained the entire procedure and ensured that the procedure was conducted smoothly and efficiently. The post extraction care was also excellent and am well on my way to recover y.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Good experience happy with the treatment for my sons tooth  root canal ,doctor was extremely patient and supportive

Dr. Gaurav Poplai is a very knowledgable individual. Extremely warm, gentle and welcoming too. 
He's someone who is very passionate about dentistry. The enthusiasm with which he operates makes it very clear that he loves what he does. As a result of this he has a perfectionist's approach to his work.
He's one of the few doctors i've met who takes the effort of explaining every single step of the treatment to the patient. This way you know exactly what he is planning and feel actively a part of the process. 

I have a lot of dental issues and have visited over 5 dentists in the last 4 years, most of them look for quick/ temporary solutions to problems. Dr. Poplai, on the other hand, suggested to me upfront that i should look for a permanent solution, even if it means waiting a little longer. 

Unlike most dental clinics, his clinic in Bandra is large, airy and beautifully done up. There is always soft music playing in the background, hence one does not feel the usual nervousness/ claustrophobia experienced at most clinics. 

The technology he uses is state of the art. In my case (invisible braces), brackets were specially designed to fit my teeth as one single piece by a Chinese manufacturer. 

His clinic staff is extremely warm, well trained and professional. They send regular alerts and reminders for appointments.

It's very important for a patient to form trust and a certain comfort level with a doctor. Dr. Poplai makes it very easy for this to happen. He takes his work very seriously and wants the best results as much as you do. One feels a lot of ease around him as he knows exactly what he is doing and does it with a lot of confidence. 

If you're looking for a dentist, i very strongly recommend Dr. Gaurav Poplai

context: Crowns and Bridges Fixing,Teeth Whitening,Scaling / Polishing,Root Canal Treatment (RCT),
review: Located in the heart of Bandra, this clinic is easy to locate. I located this clinic on the internet and reading the reviews I decided to visit the place for a root canal. Being a new resident in Mumbai, Google was the only source to find a dental clinic. The doctors were courteous and explained the treatment plan well. The best part was the doctors valued my time and finished the RCT in a single sitting. I then got my crown which looked extremely natural. I am definitely a happy patient of The Dental Arch.

The Dental Arch is one of the best Dental Clinics in bandra. I was surprised seeing the beautiful interiors. On conversation with Dr. Poplai I found out that there are various speciality branches in dentistry, which I was not aware of. 
I had a wonderful experience getting my Implant treatment done at the center. I was explained the procedure in detail. The best part was that the doctor was decisive in the kind of Implant to be put instead of confusing me with options. I have found my family dentist.

Great dentists. They Provided information about every single thing that they planned to do, at no point are you not aware of what's happening with you. Great follow up and patient care even after the treatment was over. Its endearing to have your dentist continuously ask your well being and comfort during the course of treatment. Dr. Gaurav and Dr. Kanika are devoted to their practice. Their devotion itself speaks volumes of their professionalism. Rest assured you will always leave The Dental Arch with a smile on your face.

I am a resident of Canada and came for some work to India. I landed up having a really bad tooth ache. On inquiring for  a Dentist I found out about The Dental Arch. Initially I  was apprehensive about going to a dentist in India. Having no choice I did visit the clinic. On arrival I found the clinic to be at par with standards in Canada. The place was well done up and gave a cozy feeling. On examination I was told that I would require a Root Canal. The Root Canal was done in a single sitting the next day and was fortunately painless. I was also given a crown within a week. I must say that Dr. Gaurav Poplai handles the clinic with a lot of personal care. Seeing the professional attitude I also decided to get bleaching of my teeth done. Overall this was a very good experience.

The diagnoses came from across the table and pretty quickly. I got a little skeptical but she knew what he was doing! Pretty hand on there.
I had been to other doctors who did there best to scare me. Dr Gaurav simply gave a sunscreen and asked not to use anything else and said that he will try things/ treatments to resolve the problem. He tried a chemical peel( did not really work), then I got the laser done and waited for the after effects before posting the review. Its done perfectly without any scar, side effects, the issue is halfway resolved( need another session though).
The other aspects are as follows:-
Comfort level - high
Expense - was worth the results
Clinic - Clean and nice
Staff and follow ups- Great!
Location- Quite easy to locate in Bandra West

review: Very competent and at the same time friendly towards the patient. Procedure was completed in good time and to my satisfaction.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Came to The Dental Arch for some fillings and a Root Canal. Was very comfortable during the procedure. The doctors are very professional and explained the procedures well. The treatments were absolutely painless.
The clinic is well done up with a modern touch.

Visited the clinic for a teeth whitening procedure. The results were exquisite.  Dr. Gaurav and Dr. Kanika explained about veneers to enhance my smile. Having got veneers done I can notice the remarkable difference in my smile. I love it. I thank the doctors for all their efforts.

Immaculate sterilization protocols in the clinic. When it comes to cleanliness, I am very particular and picky. The doctors made sure all the instruments were well packaged and autoclaved. They opened the packaging of the instruments before me. Very impressive.

The Dental Arch is the place to go for your mandatory pre-wedding teeth whitening. I visited the center to get my teeth bleached before my wedding, which is scheduled in a few days. There was a visible difference in shade of my teeth. I also needed root canals to be done on 1 of my teeth which was done in a single visit.

Wonderful setup and great doctors. The doctors are to the point and the doctors are fast with their diagnosis. Got my Implant surgery done since I had two missing teeth. The results have given me beautiful and natural looking teeth, infact I cannot make out in which tooth was the surgery done.

The Dental Arch is one of the finest clinics that I have been to.  Dr. Kanika and Dr. Gaurav were polite and patient. They helped me get rid of my apprehensions regarding dental treatment. The root canal was done in a single sitting and was absolutely painless. The best part is that the doctors value time and will take you in for treatment at the time slot given to you.

This was the very first dental treatment for me and it was fabulous here. Dr. Gaurav is an Endodontist par excellence. I could not believe that a root canal can be done in a single visit and that too painlessly. The entire team is super understanding. A must visit for your dental treatments :)

Visited Dr Gaurav Poplai' s clinic in bandra for a root canal treatment recently. Since I got to know about his clinic through the internet I was a little hesitant. But after having received the treatment, I can strongly recommend this clinic to one and all as a one stop destination for all your dental needs.

A great experience with Dr. Gaurav Poplai. The treatment was smooth and painless. Was actually surprised that root canal treatment can be comfortable and pain free. Was relieved of my tooth ache the very next day. Dr. Poplai handles you with such great care. Wishing the best to The Dental Arch. :)

It has been a lovely experience in interacting with Dr. Gaurav Poplai. He took the effort to explain the procedure and only then went ahead with the root canal treatment. The clinic environment added to the pleasant experience. The décor is subtle and elegant. The instruments were well packaged. The doctor was forthcoming to show the sterilization process followed in the clinic. Clinic is recommended.

The Clinic is one of the most modern and well designed clinics that I have seen. It is not a small cubicle but a nice and spacious space which gives a very positive feel. The standard of hygiene is extremely high in the clinic, and the staff has maintained very high protocols of cleanliness. 
Dr. Gaurav Poplai was very helpful in explaining and conducting the procedure. I personally was very impressed with the results of the aesthetic work done. Would definitely recommend him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I am very scared from needles but at first the needle didn’t hurt me at all. Due to hypo sensitivity in my teeth the root canal was feeling difficult to me until Dr Gaurav made me feel very comfortable and he was very quick at doing two rct under 1.5 hours. I would love to share his friendliness towards us & understanding the pain we can go through by making it completely painless.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Excellent experience. Good guidance. With this great experience we will surely recommend others for the treatment.

The most professional doctors I have come across. Not once has have they made me wait for more than 10 mins. Root Canal Treatment was finished without making me feel a thing. Will definitely tell family and friends about this clinic.
I got an implant placed for a missing molar. Results were amazing. The implantologist was kind enough to explain the procedure before we started the procedure.

I had one decayed tooth and one tooth which was missing. Went to The Dental Arch after a friend recommended the clinic. The place is professional and the the doctors show a lot of confidence in their work.

context: Crowns and Bridges Fixing,Root Canal Treatment (RCT),
review: Superb Clinic and even better staff. Found this place online as I had unbearable pain. The root canal treatment was done without any discomfort.

context: Crowns and Bridges Fixing,Root Canal Treatment (RCT),
review: Wonderful experience! The clinic is top notch. Sincerely thank the team for making me comfortable during the procedure. After the root canal I opted for metal free crown which resembles the tooth completely. This place is definitely recommended.
Beautiful clinic. Absolutely painless root canal done. I am very thankful to Dr. Gaurav for a very nice experience.

context: Crowns and Bridges Fixing,Root Canal Treatment (RCT),
review: I would definitely recommend this clinic for all your dental issues. Dr. Gaurav and Dr. Kanika are superb with their approach.

I always wanted whiter and brighter teeth. My smoking habit did not allow me have have them. The bleaching procedure done at the center has given the colour that I have always desired. Thank you Dental Arch.

Very good clinic. Doctors are well versed with what they are doing. Fillings that were done are comfortable and look natural. I will next visit to change my metallic fillings with the tooth coloured fillings.
There are clinics and then there is The Dental Arch. I was afraid of getting my root canal done, but Dr. Poplai was superb with it. To top it the root canal was done in one sitting. Superb :)

context: Crowns and Bridges Fixing,Root Canal Treatment (RCT),
review: The clinic has one of the finest ambience that I have seem. Impeccable cleanliness and hygiene. This approach to detail makes it sure that I will approach the clinic again for any further need of dental treatment.

Dr. Kanika at the dental arch is the sweetest and most comforting dentist I have come across. *** ********* *** **** **** *** the doctor called up herself on follow-up to make sure I was doing fine. This personal touch was appreciated.
I have this wonderful smile because of Dr. Poplai. I had gaps in between my teeth and the doctor assured me a brand new smile with veneers

A good doctor is passionate about his or her profession, and that is exactly what you see in Dr. Poplai. The clinic setup is superb. The personalised attention that was received during the treatment make you extremely comfortable.
********* ******* *** ***** Very happy with the results. ****** ** **** ** *********. A good place to go for your dental treatments.
Wonderful treatment facility at The Dental Arch. Painless procedure conducted by Dr. Gaurav. Very Happy.
Dr. Gaurav is a great doctor . The stress about visiting a dentist is no more. He has gentle hands and is a kind person . My experience was great overall !
Fantastic Clinic. I have been very happy with the services of The Dental Arch. The staff was courteous and polite.
Excellent service- very comforting experience. Very nicely done up clinic. Will definetely recommend.

Great work done. Could not believe root canals can be done in one single sitting and that too with such comfort. The crown that was fixed was very natural looking. Glad to be treated at the dental arch.
Extremely nice clinic with great ambience. Great to see  the sterilization protocols followed at the center and the final results of the treatment was extremely satisfactory and nice.
Doctor was very polite and patient. Very nice experience. The Clinic environment in Amazing. It was nice to see all the instruments packaged and sterilized.
Great work Dr Gaurav, timeliness with no pain at all and i feel like i have a brand new set of teeth. thank you very much.
The doctor was polite , understanding and to the point . He is professional and explained the required fields properly

I was explained in detail the problem, the course of action to be followed and every step was done with my consent. He tried his best to retrieve the parts and not start the procedure from start.

Overall a good and satisfactory experience.
Very friendly and accommodating staff, very good consultation and great results at the end of it. Can recommend it!

review: Excellent human **** ********* ****** ** ******* *** ********** Will rate 10/10. **** ************* *** very concerned to see patients don't face any pain

review: Very professionally and adeptly solved. The dental job done was completely up to the mark. Also helped me understand solutions to my other dental problems.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
context: Impacted Tooth,Oral & Maxillofacial Surgery,Wisdom Tooth Extraction,
review: The doctor spoke proper English and was helpful in his explanation. He made me feel comfortable. The procedure was more painful than hoped but the doctors listened if I told them I was uncomfortable. The tools where clean and adequate.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Absolutely painless treatment and the doctor keeps on explaining the treatment through out, which makes patient feel very comfortable.

Had a Great Experience....  He Explained the Procedure really well. There was a visible change in the shade after Cleaning, Polishing and Bleaching. Looking forward to my next appointment!!! Loving my new smile.
Excellent environment. Spic n span. Felt totally at ease. Absolutely comforting. Satisfied with the work.

excellant treatment, great care taken each and every step of procedure is minutely taken care to see there the root canal is done till the required depth. I can always recommend the doctors to my friends & relatives and wish all the sucess .
I have already recommended Dr Gaurav to friends and my wife has started visiting him as well. Had a great result with my teeth whitening. He is knowledgeable and good at hand holding.
Good, very understanding helpfull caring had a good word and suggested some good way to take more care
A perfect job, with a friendly attitude. dr. Gaurav is a good Human Being. Thank you Doc. Stay Blessed. The clinic is definitely recommended.  :)

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Always made sure I was comfortable throughout the procedure also was very friendly during the whole time. Quick as well with doing the root canal
Excellent experience.Very friendly doctors. I was adviced about all possible options regarding a crown and extraction of wisdom tooth. Very happy with the service.
